医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
补充芝麻油：预防绝经后骨质疏松症的潜在突破？研究发现，每日补充芝麻油可以通过增强骨形成、减少骨吸收以及维持血清雌激素和芳香酶水平来预防卵巢切除大鼠的骨质疏松症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240107/Sesame-oil-supplementation-a-potential-breakthrough-in-postmenopausal-osteoporosis-prevention.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240107/Sesame-oil-supplementation-a-potential-breakthrough-in-postmenopausal-osteoporosis-prevention.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=35c49271-5252-484e-a951-efb28c20c06e Sun, 07 Jan 2024 18:56:00 -0500 Sesame oil supplementation: a potential breakthrough in postmenopausal osteoporosis prevention?
大脑波动会促进情绪记忆编码吗？研究人员发现，大脑中的编码后涟漪通过改善刺激识别和唤醒来增强情绪记忆，这表明对显着事件的选择性强化有助于记忆巩固。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240107/Do-brain-ripples-boost-emotional-memory-encoding.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240107/Do-brain-ripples-boost-emotional-memory-encoding.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dbaf639f-4100-49c5-ab85-82a8c198b96c Sun, 07 Jan 2024 18:48:00 -0500 Do brain ripples boost emotional memory encoding?
肠道酶的发现揭示了人类胆红素平衡研究人员发现 BilR 是一种肠道微生物衍生酶，对于将胆红素转化为尿胆原至关重要，从而影响人类胆红素稳态。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240107/Gut-enzyme-discovery-sheds-light-on-bilirubin-balance-in- humans.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240107/Gut-enzyme-discovery-sheds-light-on-bilirubin-balance-in- humans.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=db0dafe0-2f0d-4a04-91f9-28e052812411 Sun, 07 Jan 2024 18:39:00 -0500 Gut enzyme discovery sheds light on bilirubin balance in humans
居住在绿色空间附近与幼儿骨骼更强健有关研究发现，生命早期接触绿色空间会对幼儿的骨矿物质密度产生积极影响，这表明环境因素在骨骼健康发育中发挥着作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240107/Living-near-green-spaces-linked-to-stronger-bones-in-young-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240107/Living-near-green-spaces-linked-to-stronger-bones-in-young-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9bc04554-1763-4bf1-9375-60eafc915245 Sun, 07 Jan 2024 18:30:00 -0500 Living near green spaces linked to stronger bones in young children
路易斯维尔大学的科学家致力于消灭鼠疫耶尔森氏菌（黑死病细菌）当人体遇到细菌、病毒或有害物质时，其先天免疫细胞、中性粒细胞会在现场聚集，对抗入侵者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240105/University-of-Louisville-scientists-aim-to-disarm-Yersinia-pestis-the-bubonic-plague-bacteria.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240105/University-of-Louisville-scientists-aim-to-disarm-Yersinia-pestis-the-bubonic-plague-bacteria.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=203daa88-6992-4c54-b36c-3fc63dbdf557 Fri, 05 Jan 2024 23:58:54 -0500 University of Louisville scientists aim to disarm Yersinia pestis, the bubonic plague bacteria
加州大学戴维斯分校健康中心制定了实现医疗保健劳动力多元化的路线图医疗保健系统如何提高劳动力的多样性和包容性？ https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240105/UC-Davis-Health-develops-a-road-map-to-diversify-the-health-care-workforce.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240105/UC-Davis-Health-develops-a-road-map-to-diversify-the-health-care-workforce.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7106992b-70ad-490a-9cca-8be617a31e0a Fri, 05 Jan 2024 23:36:45 -0500 UC Davis Health develops a road map to diversify the health care workforce
使用 FES PET 对乳腺癌患者雌激素受体进行成像的新指南核医学和分子成像协会 (SNMMI) 和欧洲核医学协会 (EANM) 发布了使用 FES PET 对乳腺癌患者进行雌激素受体成像的新程序标准/实践指南。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240105/New-guidelines-for-imaging-estrogen-receptor-in-breast-cancer-患者-using-FES-PET.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240105/New-guidelines-for-imaging-estrogen-receptor-in-breast-cancer-患者-using-FES-PET.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=79437f96-9992-4544-aa77-3485a1ad12e5 Fri, 05 Jan 2024 23:28:15 -0500 New guidelines for imaging estrogen receptor in breast cancer patients using FES PET
研究人员确定了癌症免疫疗法导致胃肠道问题的机制密歇根大学健康罗格尔癌症中心的研究人员发现了一种通过基于免疫的癌症治疗导致严重胃肠道问题的机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240105/Researchers-identify-mechanism-that-c​​auses-胃肠道问题-with-cancer-immunotherapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240105/Researchers-identify-mechanism-that-c​​auses-胃肠道问题-with-cancer-immunotherapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9bb955b1-4b93-4c7d-b977-53db4ca16cbc Fri, 05 Jan 2024 22:59:02 -0500 Researchers identify mechanism that causes gastrointestinal problems with cancer immunotherapy
由预测驱动的精准手术：通过最佳风险评分优化患者护理宣布在《心血管创新与应用》杂志上发表新文章。风险预测模型是当前心脏手术实践中评估手术死亡率和术后并发症发生率的重要组成部分。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240105/Precision-surgery-powered-by-prediction-Optimizing-病人-护理-with-the-best-risk-scores.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240105/Precision-surgery-powered-by-prediction-Optimizing-病人-care-with-the-best-risk-scores.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4fb2200a-ec5d-4a2b-a317-184dd863416c Fri, 05 Jan 2024 22:32:37 -0500
冷冻消融引起阵发性心房颤动患者全身代谢变化宣布在《心血管创新与应用》杂志上发表新文章。冷冻消融（CRYO）是一种治疗心房颤动（AF）的新型导管消融技术。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240105/Cryoablation-induces-systemic-metabolic-changes-in-病人-with-paroxysmal-atrial-fibrillation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240105/Cryoablation-induces-systemic-metabolic-changes-in-病人-with-paroxysmal-atrial-fibrillation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=01eeb987-4ee5-44f8-bb64-610c199a866f Fri, 05 Jan 2024 22:08:26 -0500 Cryoablation induces systemic metabolic changes in patients with paroxysmal atrial fibrillation
